activities: Discovia provides electronic discovery services to corporate and law firm clients, including some with operations in the EU, related to the litigation process in the United States. In these instances, Discovia sometimes receives, processes and hosts for secure online review certain electronically and physically stored information from the EU, which can incidentally contain personal information.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
